page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT IN LLANGYNIDR
page.content: LLANGYNIDR HAS A NUMBER OF AMATUER ENTERTAINMENTS EVERY YEAR. THESE INCLUDE THE{SCHOOL PLAY.}LAST YEAR THE SCHOOL PUT ON JOSEPH AND HIS AMAZING TECHNICOLOUR DREAMCOAT .THIS IS SOMETHING THAT THEY PRODUCE OUTSIDE SCHOOL HOURS, HELPED BY THE TEACHERS, WHICH IS WATCHED BY ANYONE IN THE VILLAGE. THE{CHRISTMAS PANTOMIME}IS PUT ON BY THE VILLAGE DRAMA GROUP. LAST YEAR THEY PERFORMED CINDERELLA. . USUALLY THE BROWNIES DO SOMETHING LIKE PLAY THE PART OF FAIRIES. THE {EISTEDDFOD}TAKES PLACE EVERY YEAR. CHILDREN FROM ALL OVER WALES TAKE PART AND RECITE POEMS, SING, DANCE, WRITE STORIES AND OTHER THINGS, PARTLY IN WELSH. THERE IS A VILLAGE EISTEDDFOD WHICH MANY PEOPLE ATTEND. THE WINNERS GO ON TO THE REGIONAL, THEN THE NATIONAL EISTEDDFOD. THESE ARE THE TYPE OF ENTERTAINMENTS IN THE VILLAGE.
